response.explain: Since this is the first step, there is no previous error or code to explain. The task is to store strawberries in a bowl. The strawberries are currently inside the fridge and the bowl is on the countertop. The robot has nothing in its inventory.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Grasp the strawberries from the fridge.
(4) Move the robot to the bowl on the countertop.
(5) Put the strawberries in the bowl.
